definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: alw. ´[[הַמּ]], Jos 16:6 (LXX Ikasmwn, LXXL eiv Axqwq, A Maxqwq), Jos 17:7 ([[מֵאָשֵׁר]] ´[[הַמּ]]; LXX Dhlanaq, A a)po\ Aser Maxqwq, and similarly LXXL), place in NE. Ephraim, near border of Manasseh, between Shechem and TaanathShilo; Buhl:Geogr. 109 conj. khirbet kefr beita.
